text: Matthew Steven LeBlanc (; born July 25, 1967) is an American actor. He has been nominated for an Emmy and a Golden Globe Award. He is famous for his role as Joey Tribbiani on the television sitcoms Friends (1994-2004) and on its spin-off series Joey. In 2000, he won "Editor's Choice" in TV Guide Awards (as Friends). In 2002, he won "TV - Choice Actor - Comedy" at the Teen Choice Awards (as Friends). In 2005, he won "Favorite Male Television Star" at the People's Choice Awards. He stars in Episodes as a fictional version of himself. He hosted Top Gear from 2016 until 2019 ==References== == Other websites == * Matt LeBlanc at Mattleblanc.net * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:People's Choice Award winners
title: Matt LeBlanc
